overview: Dave Gibbons has been engaged in the wireless industry for the past 22 years where he has been involved in realizing new wireless technologies into global, high-volume deployments including GSM, CDMA and OFDM on both the network and terminal device sides. Prior to Opanga Dave held the position of President of Elektrobit Inc profitably managing a 50M+ USD business, Vice President/CTO at AT&T Wireless overseeing AT&Tâ€™s cutting edge OFDM broadband wireless development and innovation activities, work that prefaced todays 4G LTE standards and held numerous roles with Motorola and Nokia. Dave has served on several boards and industry forums and co-founded Eden Rock Communications an industry leader in 4G SON solutions.
